shortDescription: Enjoy the soothing waves and golden sands of the world's longest sea beach.

timeline.title: Arrival and Beach Walk
timeline.activities: Arrive at Cox's Bazar, check in to the hotel, and enjoy an evening stroll on the beach.

timeline.title: Exploration and Sightseeing
timeline.activities: Visit Himchari Waterfall and Inani Beach. Spend time relaxing and capturing scenic photos.

timeline.title: Local Market and Moheshkhali Island
timeline.activities: Explore local markets for souvenirs and take a boat ride to Moheshkhali Island.

timeline.title: Beach and Departure
timeline.activities: Enjoy a morning walk on the beach and prepare for departure.

shortDescription: Discover the mesmerizing beauty of the Sundarbans and its wildlife.

timeline.title: Arrival and Boat Ride
timeline.activities: Arrive at Sundarbans and take a boat ride through the mangrove forests. Spot wildlife such as deer and crocodiles.

timeline.title: Wildlife Exploration
timeline.activities: Visit Kotka Beach and Jamtola Watchtower. Enjoy birdwatching and trekking through the jungle trails.

timeline.title: Local Villages and Departure
timeline.activities: Explore local fishing villages, take a return boat ride, and prepare for departure.

shortDescription: Explore the tranquil tea estates and indulge in nature's beauty.

timeline.title: Arrival and Tea Gardens
timeline.activities: Arrive at Srimangal, visit the lush tea gardens, and explore Lawachara National Park.

timeline.title: Madhabpur Lake and Seven Color Tea
timeline.activities: Discover the serene Madhabpur Lake and enjoy the unique Seven Color Tea experience.

timeline.title: Morning Walk and Departure
timeline.activities: Take a peaceful morning walk through the tea estates and prepare for departure.
